title: Full Stack Web Development
description: Building responsive, high-performance web applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js. I create seamless user experiences from concept to deployment.

title: Cloud Architecture & Serverless
description: Designing scalable, cost-effective cloud infrastructure on AWS. Expertise in Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, and Event-Driven Architectures.

title: API Development & Integration
description: Developing robust RESTful and GraphQL APIs using Python (FastAPI/Django) and Node.js. Secure, documented, and optimized for performance.

title: Mobile App Development
